node.name: player2
node.text: I think that it is fun

node.name: player1
node.text: For example there are various sources of entertainment such as games and music rooms

node.name: player2
node.text: I also think so because I am able to hang out with friends more

node.name: player1
node.text: I think that it does not provide as much freedom as I thought there would have been

node.name: player2
node.text: I agree, there are many rules that restrict us

node.name: Teacher
node.text: Is there any evidence that this is such?

node.name: player1
node.text: For example there are curfews and cameras everywhere
